Articles.Content:
I wonder does i can download whole complete  Soy-Juce (Soyuz) craft HGR mod.

 

I used to have such a file even it myself I myself built, but it was a long time ago.
I am a big fan of Soviet cosmonautics, by the way, in my view KSP is too little far too little of Soviet technical thought   most of stock parts are based on NASA techs.
